Description: Fragment of amygdaloid handle with gradual curve of a pottery transport amphora. Clay medium, accreted, micaceous. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name, Andron? An orthograde example is in the Benaki collection, Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (350)
